issue.title: [CF 278] Condition tab unit select lua error
issue.body:
14x TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r196.lua:3863: attempt to index global "info" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r196.lua:3863: in function "initFunction"
FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:69: in function "UIDropDownMenu_Initialize"
<string>:"*:OnLoad":2: in function "Init"
<string>:"*:OnClick":2: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
frame = TellMeWhen_IconEditorConditionsUnitDD {
0 = <userdata>
initialize = <func> @..\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3838
Init = <func> *:OnLoad:1
}
initFunction = <func> @..\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3838
displayMode = "DROPDOWN"
level = nil
menuList = nil


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #278 | Raw

comments.body:
That's what happens when you get distracted while you are coding, I suppose.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
